experiences.title: AI Master Student
experiences.company: Faculty of Sciences and Technologies of Tangier (FSTT)
experiences.description: Co-developing strategic AI solutions for intelligent automation and workflow optimization. Supporting deployment architecture, integration with existing systems, and data flow design.

experiences.title: ERP Odoo Implementation Intern
experiences.description: Implemented Odoo ERP on a local server for a multi-company holding. Designed internal exchange platforms and automated key workflows (purchase, sales, inventory). Worked on server-side deployment and security access for cloud ERP.

experiences.title: Check-In and Boarding Agent
experiences.description: Two-month role with certification in check-in and boarding. Ensured smooth passenger flow and compliance with aviation regulations.

experiences.title: Designer freelance et vendeur sur Redbubble
experiences.description: Created and sold original designs online, managing the full process from concept to sale.

projects.name: Real-Time Market Study & Reporting Agent
projects.description: Built a SaaS use case with automatic workflows using LangChain, LangGraph, and MCP for real-time search and report generation.

projects.name: Odoo-Based Exchange & Trading Platform
projects.description: Implemented Odoo in a local cloud to create a secure, centralized ERP for managing inter-company purchases, sales, and financial analytics.

projects.name: HR Process Optimization with Odoo
projects.description: Streamlined HR operations in Odoo using a semi-real scenario: from recruitment to employee management, including automated emails, pre-hiring tests, and document handling.

projects.name: Interactive Data Analysis & Visualization Platform
projects.description: Developed a web app for dataset import, processing, and visualization with integrated machine learning for training and prediction.

projects.name: Real-Time Amazon Review Analysis Pipeline
projects.description: Built a streaming data pipeline to classify Amazon review sentiments using machine learning.

projects.name: Smart Airport Luggage Tracking System (IoT)
projects.description: Created an IoT system to track luggage via QR code and mobile app. Used Node-RED for flows, Firebase for real-time DB, and React Native for the UI.

projects.name: Preserving Moroccan Culture through Deep Learning (thurathIA)
projects.description: Scientific project applying CNNs to classify traditional Moroccan Zellige tiles. Aimed at preserving cultural heritage through AI-based pattern recognition and dataset analysis.
